alert.note: Alert for Kanawha; Putnam (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 28 at 8:09PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Kanawha and east central Putnam Counties through 830 PM EDT... At 808 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Institute, or near Nitro, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Charleston, Nitro, Jefferson, South Charleston, St. Albans, Dunbar, Cross Lanes, Institute, and Tornado. This includes the following highways... Interstate 79 between mile markers 1 and 4. Interstate 77 in West Virginia between mile markers 99 and 107. Interstate 64 in West Virginia between mile markers 46 and 57. Route 119 between mile markers 73 and 80. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
